title: Marl Bouchard, M.Sc.
text: Welcome Whether itâ€™s a chronic neckache, lower back pain, a repetitive stress injury or a traumatic incident, pain can alter our daily life and deeply impact our sense of self. Via the skillset I have developed from massage therapy and Structural integration, I can address restrictions and deeply ingrained patterns of strain in your body's connective tissue, resulting in less aches and pains, easier movements, increased energy and improved posture. Marl Bouchard, M.Sc. Structural Integration - Rolfing Registered Massage Therapy (benefits apply)
